movies.title: Girls Unbutton
movies.originalTitle: Bat kau lau dik lui haai
movies.plot: Ditsy Jenny can't get her boyfriend nor politician papa to love her. She meets a hunky gang boss, but he gets killed. Will clumsy boat fan Ho be the one?
movies.simplePlot: Ditsy Jenny can't get her boyfriend nor politician papa to love her. She meets a hunky gang boss, but he gets killed. Will clumsy boat fan Ho be the one?

biography.bio: Loletta Lee was born on January 8, 1966 in Kwangchow, China as Lee Lai Chun. She is an actress, known for Zui hou sheng li (1987), Gwai ma hau yuen (1987) and Wong Kok cha 'fit' yan (1996).
biography.name: Loletta Lee

biography.bio: See-Ho Leung is an actor, known for Girls Unbutton (1994), Sex and the Emperor (1994) and Miracles - Mr. Canton and Lady Rose (1989).
biography.name: See-Ho Leung

biography.bio: Chun Hung Cheung is an actor, known for Running Out of Time (1999), High Risk (1995) and The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story (1993).
biography.name: Chun Hung Cheung

biography.bio: Oi-Git Fan is an actress, known for Yu yan kuang qing (1993), Yan yuk lap Cheung (1993) and China Girls (1993).
biography.name: Oi-Git Fan

biography.bio: Yu Lan Hung is an actress, known for Girls Unbutton (1994) and Chung on sut luk: Tuen Man sik mo (1994).
biography.name: Yu Lan Hung

biography.bio: Chi-Ming Kwong is an actor, known for Big Bullet (1996), Girls Unbutton (1994) and Yi jiu si jiu zhi jie hou ying xiong zhuan (1993).
biography.name: Chi-Ming Kwong

biography.bio: Chiu-Wing Lam is an actor and writer, known for Vulgaria (2012), Shaolin Basket (2008) and Dancing Lion (2007).
biography.name: Chiu-Wing Lam

biography.bio: Miki Ng is an actress, known for Girls Unbutton (1994), Jiu jiu jiu shui shi xiong shou (1994) and Tong ju guan xi (1993).
biography.name: Miki Ng

biography.bio: Chung Hang Siu is an actor, known for Girls Unbutton (1994), Dai si doi (1992) and Land of the Condors (1992).
biography.name: Chung Hang Siu

biography.bio: Elvis Tsui was born on October 10, 1960 in Mudanjiang, Heilongjiang, China. He is an actor, known for The Grandmaster (2013), City on Fire (1987) and The Lovers (1994).
biography.name: Elvis Tsui

biography.bio: Wah Wo Wong is an actor, known for Exilé (2006), Mad detective (2007) and Running Out of Time (1999).
biography.name: Wah Wo Wong

biography.bio: Kwok Leung Yau is an actor, known for Hua jie shen nu (1991), Girls Unbutton (1994) and Ao qi xiong ying (1989).
biography.name: Kwok Leung Yau

biography.bio: Yuk-Mui Yeung is an actress, known for Kickboxer (1989), God of Gamblers (1989) and Da nei mi tan: Zhi ling ling xing xing (1996).
biography.name: Yuk-Mui Yeung
